title: Return of the wolves: How deer escape tactics help save their lives

title_detail.value: Return of the wolves: How deer escape tactics help save their lives

summary: As gray wolves return to Washington state, a new study finds that one species of deer is changing its behavior to spend more time away from roads, at higher elevations and in rockier landscapes.

summary_detail.value: As gray wolves return to Washington state, a new study finds that one species of deer is changing its behavior to spend more time away from roads, at higher elevations and in rockier landscapes.
